description:
Guns are gonna be banned soon. It is inevitable. But with those scary boom sticks off the streets, you'll need a way to defend your stuff. Here are 7 more ways to defend your home when guns are banned once and for all.

Stay stocked up on ammunition... automatically! Weather the ammo shortage storms with @Ammosquared. Sign up today and get 75 rounds of 9mm practice in your account FREE: https://ammosquared.com/bee

#babylonbee #comedy
title: 7 More Ways To Defend Your Home Without Evil Guns
